## Description {#details}

A suitably aligned and sized character array member which can hold elements of any type.

This template is equivalent to std::aligned&#95;union&#95;t&lt;1, ...&gt;, but we cannot use it due to a bug in the MSVC x86 compiler: <a href="https://github.com/microsoft/STL/issues/1533">https://github.com/microsoft/STL/issues/1533</a> Using <code>alignas</code> here works around the bug.

Definition at line 27 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/alignof-h">AlignOf.h</a>.
